## Source: amazon-inspector (f6aa8994c57ee31c123cc2e817e82c8bd399d9b3448023298e1dc6b5c8e04494)
The package othw was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1b703e37491c7489a512923ceefa27880a0555859eaa98605b6a6fed4637f159)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'othw' @ 999.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
